statements: SELECT * FROM planting_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE rainfall_amount > 50.00;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE temperature_range LIKE '%75°F - 85°F%';
SELECT * FROM planting_schedule ORDER BY rainfall_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE soil_ph < 6.0 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM planting_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY planting_date DESC, rainfall_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE temperature_range LIKE '%cool%' AND soil_ph > 6 ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date, rainfall_amount FROM planting_schedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT crop_name, soil_ph FROM planting_schedule WHERE rainfall_amount > 10 AND temperature_range = 'Warm'
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE temperature_range IN ('Hot', 'Moderate') ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PlantingSchedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC, crop_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT planting_id, crop_name, growth_stage FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE growth_stage='Seedling';
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE planting_location='Greenhouse' AND harvest_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT planting_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT management_id, crop_name, management_practice FROM CropManagement ORDER BY management_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE planting_location = 'Backyard' ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT planting_id, growth_stage, planting_location FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT crop_name, management_practice, management_date FROM CropManagement WHERE success_rate > 80 ORDER BY management_date DESC;
SELECT management_id, crop_name, success_rate FROM CropManagement WHERE management_practice LIKE '%organic%' AND success_rate > 90 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM planting_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_yield WHERE yield_amount > 100;
SELECT crop_name, yield_date FROM crop_yield ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name LIKE '%Tomato%';
SELECT * FROM planting_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomatoes';
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT planting_schedule.crop_name, crop_yield.yield_amount FROM planting_schedule INNER JOIN crop_yield ON planting_schedule.crop_name = crop_yield.crop_name WHERE crop_yield.yield_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Crop_Mix ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM Crop_Mix WHERE yield_per_acre > 5000;
SELECT planting_date, crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM Crop_Mix WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM Weather_Data WHERE observation_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT soil_type, pH_level, nutrients FROM Soil_Composition WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Mix ORDER BY crop_name DESC, planting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_acre FROM Crop_Mix WHERE yield_per_acre > 500 ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT p.crop_id, p.planting_date, s.soil_type, s.pH_level FROM Planting_Schedule p JOIN Soil_Composition s ON p.recommended_soil_type = s.soil_type ORDER BY s.pH_level ASC, p.planting_date DESC;
SELECT c.crop_name, w.temperature, w.humidity FROM Crop_Mix c JOIN Weather_Data w ON c.crop_name LIKE CONCAT('%', w.location, '%') ORDER BY c.crop_name ASC, w.temperature DESC;
SELECT s.soil_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Soil_Composition s GROUP BY s.soil_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM planting_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM planting_schedule WHERE optimal_temperature > 25;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM planting_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_details WHERE planting_depth < 5 AND growth_period > 90;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date, quality_rating FROM harvest_records WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY harvest_date;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, optimal_temperature FROM planting_schedule WHERE optimal_temperature > 25 ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND precipitation < 5 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT cd.crop_name, cd.planting_depth, hr.yield FROM crop_details cd JOIN harvest_records hr ON cd.crop_name = hr.crop_name WHERE hr.yield > 100 ORDER BY hr.yield DESC
SELECT fs.field_id, fs.fertilization_date, fs.pest_control, cd.optimal_ph FROM field_maintenance fs JOIN crop_details cd ON fs.field_id = cd.id WHERE fs.pest_control LIKE '%chemical%'

SELECT ps.crop_name, ps.planting_date, wd.temperature, wd.humidity FROM planting_schedule ps JOIN weather_data wd ON ps.planting_date = wd.date WHERE wd.temperature > ps.optimal_temperature ORDER BY ps.planting_date ASC
